dealer.title: TME Dealer Finder - Outlet Schema
dealer.description: this schema describes an outlet in the Toyota Motor Europe dealer network

addresses.description: A list of addresses associated with this outlet

country.description: 2 digit country ISO code in upper case

defaultAddress.description: Easy access to the default address of this outlet

defaultEmail.description: Easy access to the default email address of this outlet

defaultPhoneNumber.description: Easy access to the default phone number of this outlet

language.description: 2 digit language iso code in lower case

lastModificationDate.description: Timestamp of the last modification to this outlet

latinName.description: Representation of the name in latin characters

operatingCompany.description: The parent operating company of this outlet

oneOf.description: a representation of an operating company

addresses.description: A list of addresses associated with this operating company

defaultAddress.description: Easy access to the default address of this outlet

primaryOutlet.description: UUID of the primary outlet for this operating company

status.description: Whether this outlet is currently active or inactive (= not an official outlet)

uuid.description: The unique identifier of this operating company. Use this to reference.

primaryOutlet.description: Indicates whether this is the primary outlet of the operating company

region.description: The region for which this outlet is responsible in the dealer network

status.description: Whether this outlet is currently active or inactive (= not an official outlet)

websiteUrl.description: The location of the website for this dealer

uuid.description: The unique identifier of the outlet. This value should be used to identify a dealer.

addressCountry.description: 2 digit country ISO code in upper case

endDate.description: The date on which this party stopped operating at this address

language.description: 2 digit language iso code in lower case

startDate.description: The date on which the party started operating at this address

dealerDefinitionAddressGeoLocation.description: Longitude and latitude of the outlet location

dealerDefinitionApplication.description: a representation of a TME application

dealerDefinitionOperatingCompany.description: a representation of an operating company

endDate.description: The date on which this party stopped operating at this address

startDate.description: The date on which the party started operating at this address

dealerDefinitionOperatingCompanyAddresse.description: Longitude and latitude of the outlet location

dealerDefinitionOperatingCompanyApplicat.description: A mapping table of IDs for this operating company in other systems

dealerDefinitionCountryCode.description: 2 digit country ISO code in upper case

dealerDefinitionLanguageCode.description: 2 digit language iso code in lower case

dealerDefinitionOpenDay.description: a range of days on which a certain opening hour is valid

endDay.description: The final day on which the range of opening hours is valid

startDay.description: The first day on which the range of opening hours is valid

operation.description: The operation this set of opening hours applied to

validFrom.description: The date in DD/MM/YYYY on which these opening hours became valid

validTo.description: The date in DD/MM/YYYY until which these opening hours are valid

openFrom.description: Start hour of the opening time

openTo.description: End hour of the opening time

dealerDefinitionTime.description: a acceptable opening hour start or stop time

marketingName.description: The marketing name used on the website
